```{r seqhandling_github, echo=FALSE}

read.coverage.map <- function(infile) {
  cat('Reading in', infile, '\n', sep = ' ', file = stderr())
  #Read in our coverage map
  map <-read.table (file=infile, header=FALSE, as.is=TRUE, fill = TRUE)
  return(map)
}
```
